column4: Can someone help me figure out wtf is wrong with the ubuntu installer. This is the second time i've gone through an entire Install off the Ubuntu Mini Installation, after the "select the software you wish to install" page it moves to the next screen (progress bar) and freezes here:
It's been sitting here for 15 minutes now
last time i did this i accidentally hit reboot and when it booted up there wasn't a bootable OS on the hard drive
it's like an hour long process to get to this point and im about to jump out a window
do you have an active internet connection?
it just finished downloading & installing the entire core
can you use the desktop installer
i dont want all that junk
alright, do you have another machine around?
